mapper.select: SELECT ar.a_resource_id aResourceId, ar.resource_name resourceName, ar.action action, ar.create_time createTime, ar.is_delete isDelete, ar.delete_time deleteTime FROM admin_role ar LEFT JOIN a_role r ON ar.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_resource rr ON r.role_id = rr.role_id LEFT JOIN a_resource ar ON ar.a_resource_id = rr.a_resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ar.a_resource_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ar.a_resource_id
